description.english: Beat each base game boss with a perfect clear, also not using missiles or consumables.

Complete a floor with no damage.
Complete a run without buying any items.
Complete a run without picking up any attachment items.
Satisfy the unlock conditions for all items.
Actually find (pick up) every single item.
Kill at least one of each non-boss enemy.

displayName.english: Do You Actually Have Any Cheese?

description.english: Kill a shopkeeper.
Have 5 familiars at once.
